original_title: Pope Leo XIV moves into papal apartment with four close friends at Vatican | Fox News
article_summary: Pope Leo XIV breaks tradition by moving into a communal papal apartment, reflecting his Augustinian order's community ethos. The apartment, undergoing renovation, will be shared with four close companions, contrasting with Pope Francis' choice of a Vatican guesthouse. The move is part of Leo's effort to stay grounded and connect with his followers.</s>
